title: Reviewing Rob Zombie's Halloween One and Two
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: I didn’t mind Zombies reboot (the first one at least)

I really love both of these movies (especially part 2). I like that rob zombie didnt just make what we've seen before, which I feel a lot of people felt the opposite.

Edit:
I personally enjoy both these films in no way are they the best remakes but still fun to watch at least they're way better than the friday the 13th remake

I’d like to know why I was removed from the freaks of AHS group when I always followed the rules and even reported spoilers so it would not be ruined for anyone else in the group,I feel discriminated against, I’ve made lots of friends I can talk to about AHS and now I’m getting denied that for no apparent reason, is there a way I can be added back into the group I’m sad and confused AND it’s Wednesday:(
I agree with you on everything.   I have one to add.  I didn't like that Mike killed the guide who actually treated Mike as a person.  Danny T. Rocks
description:
► ► SUBSCRIBE https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCc5r...

Happy Halloween! I hope you enjoy my review of Rob Zombie's remake of Halloween part one and two.
